name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior JavaScript Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in crafting high-performance solutions for diverse sectors, prominently healthcare and finance. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and modern web technologies including **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **SASS**. Skilled in leveraging tools such as **Webpack** and **Gulp** for efficient build processes.

Expertise in building and maintaining microservices architectures and utilizing frameworks that promote scalable application development. Demonstrated ability to work with CI/CD practices, ensuring timely deployment and integration. Proven track record of developing dynamic applications that adhere to compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS.

In addition to technical acumen, I bring a solid foundation in team collaboration and project management, consistently delivering robust and secure applications, while also mentoring junior developers in best practices.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and optimized scalable, full-stack applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js**, ensuring robustness and maintainability across various projects.
- Leveraged modern front-end frameworks, specifically **React** (versions **17-18**) and **HTML5**, to create dynamic and interactive user interfaces, enhancing user engagement and experience.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams utilizing **Git** for version control, ensuring seamless integration and deployment processes.
- Implemented responsive design techniques using **CSS3**, **SASS**, and **LESS** to deliver consistent and aesthetically pleasing interfaces across different devices and screen sizes.
- Architected microservice-based architectures, enhancing performance and scalability of applications while ensuring adherence to best practices.
- Employed **Webpack** and **Gulp** for efficient asset management and build processes, contributing to reduced load times and improved application performance.
- Conducted unit and integration testing using **Playwright** ensuring high code quality and reliability across all features.
- Integrated modern ECMAScript standards (**ECMAScript5** and **ECMAScript6**) to maintain code best practices while enhancing functionality and user experience.
- Monitored application performance and user feedback to iteratively improve functionality and resolve any issues promptly, ensuring customer satisfaction.
- Mentored junior developers by providing guidance on coding best practices and modern technologies, fostering a collaborative learning environment.

• Developed dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React (18)**, **TypeScript**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3**, ensuring high performance and responsiveness for financial dashboards and admin portals.
• Leveraged **Node.js** along with **Microservices** architecture to enhance the scalability and maintainability of high-volume transaction systems.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Git** for version control, ensuring effective changes and improvements to the codebase across a team of 9 engineers.
• Applied advanced styling techniques using **SASS** and **LESS** to create visually appealing and consistent user interfaces while adhering to design guidelines.
• Optimized build processes utilizing **Webpack** and **Gulp**, resulting in a 30% reduction in loading times for enterprise-level applications.
• Maintained and improved applications by implementing modern JavaScript features from **ECMAScript6**, ensuring adherence to best practices in coding standards.
• Automated testing and deployment processes using **Playwright**, which led to a 25% increase in code quality and application stability.

Utilized **JavaScript** to develop and optimize scalable microservices for an e-commerce platform using **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), enhancing performance across key functionalities such as checkout and order processing with a focus on reducing latency to under **200ms**.
Constructed dynamic, engaging frontend components in **React** (18), ensuring fast load times of under **3 seconds** on multiple devices and implementing responsive design via **HTML5** and **CSS3** for optimal user experience.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement version control practices using **Git**, facilitating smoother workflows and enhanced collaboration on code repositories.
Employed modern CSS preprocessors like **SASS** and **LESS**, achieving modular and maintainable styles across frontend applications while enhancing design consistency.
Orchestrated build processes using **Webpack** and **Gulp**, resulting in optimized application bundles that reduce load times by up to **30%**.
Developed and maintained high-quality codebases in line with **ECMAScript6** standards, implementing best practices to ensure maintainability and scalability of the code.
Tested and validated UI functionality through **Playwright**, achieving an automated test coverage of over **90%**, ensuring robust and bug-free deployments.
Worked with backend teams to integrate APIs and improve application resilience, contributing to a microservices architecture that increased deployment frequency by more than **50%**.
Participated in extensive code reviews and contributed to team knowledge sharing, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the engineering department.
